idea:
BLUE PARADIGM LLP is a partnership firm with Flagship Biotech International Pvt. Ltd, a fast-growing pharma manufacturing and exports company as majority partner.  


BLUE PARADIGM LLP was formed with the objective of discovering NCEs and investigating the suitability of repurposed drugs for new therapy areas - in new forms and dosages for providing affordable healthcare solutions for India and the world.
name: Blue Paradigm LLP

idea:
IT company- Macvision Softech Solutions is a Web Design and Development Company in India.

The team at Macvision has passionately created countless engaging and profitable websites for small and medium-sized businesses around the world.
name: Macvision Softech Solutions

idea: A new multi-language streaming App (OTT) focused on the Entertainment / Edutainment contents as Films / Series / Non Fiction Shows / Gaming Shows / Documentaries etc. that fitsto user’s time and plan.
name: BIIGGBANG AMUSEMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our startup aims to revolutionize the healthcare related assistive devices landscape to enable specially abled people be at par with a normal man. Our first product, the "Patient transfer device" is the only transfer assistant a wheelchair user will ever require. It’s a transfer stool, attachable to any conventional wheelchair enabling  an individual wheelchair user to transfer herself from a wheelchair to any target location such as a toilet, with or without minimal external assistance. It is self-operable, height-adjustable and allows transfer in a dignified position. The ability to transfer at will in a safe and secure manner adds to a patient’s quality of life and makes the job of caregiving significantly easier.
name: EZERCON MEDTECH INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are into 3D Printer selling and Lab setup with all new technologies and we manufacture Filament which we intend to export all over world
name: PROTOMONT TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea: We are an entity involved in manufacturing biofuel from biodegradable waste
name: ADVANCED BIOFUEL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Agraw Organics, based in Bombay, is a newly launched start up in sustainable, organic and natural foods! It aims to provide impactful eating solutions, farmer transparency, and an alternative to living a chemical free life. We provide food in eco-friendly packaging, and strive towards a plastic free environment.
name: Agraw Organics

idea:
White-labelled Solutions for Resellers

United Web Network (UWN) aims at creating a network of developers, designers and resellers.

UWN specifically facilitates the reselling agencies and affiliates to establish their brands by providing them a white labelled platform which can enable them in setting up a branded website builder with wide range of features.

The platform also enables the developers and designers to contribute new features and designs which can be sold by the resellers to their customers, partners and even their own appointed resellers.

Hence, UWN shares the advantages of an open source system and packs it inside a white-labelled commercial application benefiting both, the resellers and the contributors.
name: United Web Network Private Limited

idea: Shilpi has spent most of her formative years growing up in Lucknow & Banaras. Ever since she went to the local bazaar with her mother at the age of 11, she was bedazzled by the astute, intricate and enrapturing designs of the handmade sarees and jewelries. Growing up, she realized that our country’s artisans are struggling to make their ends meet despite their reservoir of rare talent. This experience and realization left an indelible mark on her psyche, after which she spent 18 years working in the corporate world and saved enough money to promote the talent of Indian artisans in her own capacity. Shilpi has traversed across India to gain as much knowledge of the country’s artisans, their detailed works and designs. She has made it her life’s mission to give a boost and advance their expertise and flair in producing such startling artifacts and clothes, all made by bare hands. We at Meherkriti are inspired by contemporary designs handcrafted by talented artisans allover India. We celebrate the uniqueness each product entails which is made by artisans with exceptional skills. Enchanted by the hard work of these brilliant craftsmen and in awe of their abilities, we hope to bring forward their creativity and distinctive ideology which is more than just a product.
name: Meherkriti

idea: THE COMPANY IS PRIMARILY ENGAGED IN THE SUPPLY OF ORGANIC PROTIEN BARS INCLUDING HEALTH SUPPLEMENTAL PRODUCTS.
name: AVOSS HEALTH TECH PRIVATE LIMITED
